text: Douglas A. "Doug" Ducey (born April 9, 1964) is an American politician. He was the 23rd Governor of the U.S. State of Arizona. He is a member of the Republican Party, and was sworn in as Governor on January 5, 2015. He also served as the 32nd State Treasurer of Arizona. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Toledo, Ohio
title: Doug Ducey
